verses.name: John 5:21
verses.text: For as the Father raiseth up the dead, and quickeneth them; even so the Son quickeneth whom he will.

verses.name: John 5:22
verses.text: For the Father judgeth no man, but hath committed all judgment unto the Son:

verses.name: John 5:23
verses.text: That all men should honour the Son, even as they honour the Father. He that honoureth not the Son honoureth not the Father which hath sent him.

verses.name: John 5:24
verses.text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, He that heareth my word, and believeth on him that sent me, hath everlasting life, and shall not come into condemnation; but is passed from death unto life.
